subproject.description: Communities enjoy improved access to safe drinking water and initiatives that promote sustainable use of water for industrial and domestic purposes in an environment highly aware about responsible water use as a natural resource.
subproject.title: Every Drop Matters - Coca Cola

subproject.description:
The Parties agree to cooperate in the following areas of activities:


i)	Projects and activities within countries mutually identified and agreed to by both Parties that increase access to safe drinking water to improve people’s lives. These could include projects and activities focused on priorities to be identified on a consultative basis to engage local actors, to build awareness on effective water management and to undertake small-scale pilot initiatives to address water management issues.

ii)	Activities at a regional level that support effective water management with an impact in two or more countries. Such activities may include integrated land and water management projects, the promotion and transfer of environmentally sound technologies in the industrial sector or other activities agreed upon by both parties.   

iii)	Outreach and awareness raising activities, as well as knowledge management initiatives and possible joint publications, on the importance of access to safe drinking water in communities, strategies and policies to support effective regional land and water management, industry-sector related “good practices”, and so forth.  

iv)	The specific activities will be further developed and agreed upon through a Steering Committee, consisting of representatives from both Parties, which will be responsible for strategic decisions with regard to project implementation and building and maintaining trust in the partnership between UNDP and TCCC. The Steering Committee will comprise of 6 members, and will include 3 representatives from UNDP-RBEC and 3 representatives from TCCC-EMED.
subproject.title: Every Drop Matter-Proj.Coord.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
